name: BlindSight (itch) (GEsi)
description:
An audio-only survival “horror” game using a first-person character who moves through the forest calling out for their injured friend to assist them to get out of the forest. The goal for the player is to try their best to not get deceived by a creature, who mimics sounds, which is also in the forest trying to track the player and capture them. The game is fully audio driven and will provide an accessible game and interface to those who are both visually impaired and those who are not.

This is my first audio-only game, its currently only built for Mac, and there may be a couple issues but it would be awesome to get your feedback!
